recommendations: Ankit Nanavati ‚ÄúI have recently completed a successful project with Siddharth and find it necessary to commend him for noteworthy work in creating a promising intellectual property called EVConIndia 2019. Siddharth personifies the entrepreneurial spark of young India. He possesses the right acumen and attitude needed to lead a industry body exclusively for leaders. Siddharth is a natural collaborator and has great relationship skills. His communication is honest and articulate. Siddharth f ully acknowledges the importance to create value for the partnering organization and makes earnest efforts towards the same. I certainly look forward to more opportunities in the future to work with him.‚Äù

Tanya Meshram ‚ÄúWorking with Siddharth has been amazing as he is a motivated, forward-thinking leader. He differs from other leaders with respect to his workflow, skills, and ingenuity which helped create a fun and invigorating environment. His enthusiasm and positive disposition towards work and life are both inspiring and infectious. Siddharth also helps create an environment conducive to creativity by actively encouraging and contributing to discussions. Overall, Siddharth is an absolute delight to work with and can bring out the best in anyone. ‚Äù
